ing: 2 fluid ounces Champagne or other sparkling white wine
1 (2 inch) piece lemon peel for garnish
des: "A whiskey cocktail named after Queen Victoria's son, Edward. This one features a shaken chunk of pineapple and a topper of champagne."
ins: Pour sugar, warm water, and a dash of bitters to a cocktail glass, and stir to dissolve. Add ice to a cocktail shaker and pour in sugar mixture. Pour in whiskey, cherry liqueur, and a chunk of pineapple. Shake well to crush pineapple, then strain into a  chilled glass. Top with sparkling wine and garnish with a twist of lemon.
